packages.name: At Home Simulator
packages.description: Turn lights on and off to simulate the appearance of an occupied home using YOUR normal routine.

packages.name: BI Control
packages.description: Designed to work locally with Blue Iris security software.

packages.name: CATT Director
packages.description: Take control of a Chromecast device using CATT.

packages.name: Chromecast Helper
packages.description: Simple way to help keep your Goolge/Nest devices alive.

packages.name: Device Check Plus
packages.description: Check selected devices, then warn you what's not in the right state.

packages.name: Device Sequencer
packages.description: Turn on/off several devices in a row, with a user defined pause in between each.

packages.name: Device Watchdog
packages.description: Keep an eye on your devices and see how long it's been since they checked in.

packages.name: Follow Me
packages.description: Never miss a message again. Send messages to your occupied room speakers when home or by pushover when away. Automatically!

packages.name: Fully Kiosk Director
packages.description: Take control of a Fully Kiosk device! * Requires additional driver, instructions within app.

packages.name: Home Tracker
packages.description: Track the coming and going of house members with announcements and push messages. Including a 'Welcome Home' message after entering the home!

packages.name: Hub Watchdog
packages.description: Simple way to monitor if your hub is slowing down or not.

packages.name: Life360 Tracker
packages.description: Track your Life360 users. Works with the Life360 with States app.

packages.name: Life360 with States
packages.description: Connect Life360 to Hubitat including ALL states.

packages.name: Lighting Effects
packages.description: Designed to make static holiday lights dim or flicker randomly. Can also randomly change colors on color change bulbs, completely seperate or all together. Creating a spooky, sparkly or party effect.

packages.name: Magic Cube
packages.description: Take control of your Xiaomi Mi Cube. Control devices based on Flip, Slide, Knock, Rotation and Shake.

packages.name: One at a Time
packages.description: Designed to allow only one switch, in a group of switches, to be on at a time.

packages.name: Presence Plus
packages.description: Creates a combined presence device that can be used with Life360 Tracker, Google Assistant, Rule Machine and More!

packages.name: Remote Wellness Check
packages.description: Stay connected to your loved ones. Get notified if they haven't triggered a device in a specified time.

packages.name: Room Director
packages.description: Make your rooms smarter by directing them to do what you want, automaticaly.

packages.name: Send IP2IR
packages.description: This app is designed to send commands to an iTach IP2IR device.

packages.name: Simple Device Timer
packages.description: Simple Device Timer with safety checks, reminders, multiple timers and restrictions.

packages.name: Tile Master
packages.description: Create a tile with multiple devices with control.

packages.name: Weather Dot Gov
packages.description: Making the Weather.gov data usable with Hubitat.
